title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.6 - Requests for public access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.6 - Requests for public access to records

State Regulations
(a) A request for records shall be directed
to the records access officer. The request may be made orally or in
writing. (b) A request shall
describe the record or records sought with as much specificity as possible. Whenever possible, a person requesting records shall supply information
regarding the titles and dates of the records, file designations or other
information that may help to describe the records sought. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7801.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
